segments.text: When can I have your firm C . I . F . prices , that is to say , the final offer , Mr . London ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We ’ ll have them worked out by this evening and let you have them tomorrow morning . Would you be free to come by then ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I ’ ll be here tomorrow morning at 10 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Perfect . Our offer remains open for 3 days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don ’ t need that long to make up my mind . If your prices are agreeable and if I can get the commission I want , I can place the order right away .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m sure you ’ ll find our price most favorable . Elsewhere prices for hardware have gone up tremendously in recent years . Our prices haven ’ t changed much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m glad to hear that . As I ’ Ve just said , I hope to conclude some substantial business with you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We shall be very pleased . Is there anything else I can do for you , Mrs . Anderson ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m buying for chain department stores in Canada . They are also interested in Egyptian carpets . Could you introduce me to the person in charge of this line ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly , I ’ ll make an appointment for you with Mr . Jordan of the Egypt National Native Produce and Animal By-products Import and Export Corporation .
segments.speaker: S2
